hero.title: Love, Sex, and Love Children
hero.description: What was once taboo is becoming the new normal as out-of-wedlock births soar in the Philippines.

primary.lead: 'Atin Ito' Civilian Flotilla Voyage to Scarborough Shoal
primary.title: Atin Ito holds protest voyage vs China's bullying
primary.description: Some 200 Filipino activists and fisherfolk led by Akbayan Youth and Atin Ito coalition conducted a 2-day voyage to the West Philippine Sea on Thursday.

secondary.title: Civilian group's second supply run in West Philippine Sea to face 'biggest' Chinese blockade
secondary.description: The second attempt of a civilian group to conduct a supply mission in the West Philippine Sea (WPS) beginning on Tuesday, May 14, will be challenged anew by Chinese maritime forces.

secondary.title: ‘Hope for best, prepared for worst’: Scarborough civilian convoy starts
secondary.description: Masinloc, Zambales — The civilian convoy for the West Philippine Sea officially embarked on a voyage to Scarborough (Panatag) Shoal early Wednesday morning on a mission that may witness another attempt by China to disrupt the activity.

secondary.title: Atin Ito: Mission accomplished
secondary.description: Diskarteng Pinoy” – the Filipino way – made the day for the Atin Ito Coalition’s “peace and solidarity regatta” as it managed to elude a Chinese blockade of Panatag Shoal to accomplish its mission of delivering 1,000 liters of fuel and 200 food packs to Filipino fishermen in the area.

carousel.title: House passes divorce bill on second hearing - Manila Standard
carousel.description: The House of Representatives approved on second reading a bill reinstituting absolute divorce in the country. Through a voice voting, House Bill (HB) 9349, or the proposed Absolute Divorce Act, moved a step closer to plenary passage.

carousel.title: To beat the heat, Filipinos buy more than 1,000 aircons a day on credit, says finance firm
carousel.description: Filipinos made heavy use of Home Credit's 0% interest installments to buy a record number of air conditioners this summer

carousel.title: Sleepy far-flung towns in the Philippines will host US forces returning to counter China threats
carousel.description: After withdrawing at the end of the Cold War, American forces are building new presence in nine sites under a 2014 pact to counter China's increasingly assertive actions.

carousel.title: Philippines: Mayor accused of being China 'asset' raises alarm
carousel.description: The Philippines investigates a mayor as it faces increasing sea tensions with China.
